bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lou li lou 瘰癧瘺 , scrofula with fistula. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 23: 雌黃芍 藥丸，治瘰癧漏，始發於頸有根，初苦痛，令人寒熱 , “Pills with ci huang and shao yao . They cure scrofula with pervasion-illness and leakage . [This condition] first develops at the neck and has a root. From the beginning [patients] suffer pain. It makes them experience alternating sensations of cold and heat”.
